name: ListAliases
description:
Retrieve a list of Vercel aliases for a user or team.

This tool retrieves a list of aliases for the authenticated Vercel user or team. Optionally, it can filter aliases by a specific domain or project.

parameters.name: filter_by_domain
parameters.description: Return only aliases associated with the specified domain name.

value_schema.description: Get only aliases of the given domain name

parameters.name: created_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Return aliases created after this UNIX timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get only aliases created after the provided timestamp

parameters.name: maximum_aliases_to_list
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of aliases to retrieve in the request.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request

parameters.name: project_id_filter
parameters.description: Filter to list aliases associated with the specified project ID.

parameters.name: aliases_created_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Get aliases created after this JavaScript timestamp. Use a timestamp in milliseconds since the epoch.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created after this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: get_aliases_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve aliases created before the specified JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get aliases created before this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: rollback_deployment_id
parameters.description: Specify the deployment ID to get aliases that would be rolled back for that deployment.

value_schema.description: Get aliases that would be rolled back for the given deployment

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of. Use this to specify the team whose aliases should be listed.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Get only aliases of the given domain name

value_schema.description: Get only aliases of the given domain name

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Get only aliases created after the provided timestamp

value_schema.description: Get only aliases created after the provided timestamp

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request

value_schema.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Get aliases created after this JavaScript timestamp

value_schema.description: Get aliases created after this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Get aliases created before this JavaScript timestamp

value_schema.description: Get aliases created before this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: rollbackDeploymentId
parameters.description: Get aliases that would be rolled back for the given deployment

value_schema.description: Get aliases that would be rolled back for the given deployment

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
